contributors.headline: Europe Personal Care Planning Analyst at Unilever

profile_positions.description:
MAIN JOB PURPOSE:
Personal Care Category Analyst holds a critical role in supporting the Category Planning Manager, Category Planning Director, Factory Planning Manager, Portfolio & Innovation Manager and External Manufacturing Planning team.
 

• Lead weekly Market volume connect calls, challenging market planning teams on bias and feeding the information back into the supply planning category team.
• Own the quarterly Long Term Capacity Planning data management including data changes for scenario planning, monthly volume master file and monthly S&OP data set used in Brand/Planning joint connects.
• Drive harmonization of reporting across total Beauty and Personal Care category.
• Coordinate RCCP data collection.
• Share daily service report.
• Own UI volume tracking files.
• Perform ad hoc inventory and safety stock analysis.
• Perform ad hoc analysis on demand fluctuations.
• For large transformation projects, support in terms of data analysis.
profile_positions.title: Personal Care Category Planning Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for landing business and financial targets for your respective categories in Egypt and Sudan.
- Develop demand forecasts and activity grid with CCBT on multiple levels of aggregation for multiple time horizons.
- In conjunction with CCBT, review historical sales trends, research demand drivers, prepare forecast data, develop statistical forecast models, and evaluate forecast results against customer provided forecasts to determine the consensus forecast to be used to drive Supply Planning, Operational Planning and CCBT.
- Coordinate cross-functional research activities to reconcile significant variances and refine the forecast model to reflect updated sales and marketing assumptions.
- Utilize a collaborative and consensus approach by working with Sales, Marketing and Finance to obtain and ensure that current and accurate information is used for demand forecasts.
- Identify significant variances to prior forecasts for discussion during the monthly CCBT demand review process.
- Demonstrate leadership within S&OP forums assuring right information are presented to support business for better decision-making
- Use and maintain Unilever forecasting tools as well as documenting forecasting assumptions
- Provides business with necessary tools and Dashboards to improve the business processes and enables more agile decision making.
- To manage over stocks and residual products reduction program with CCBT to keep company stocks in healthy way.
- Achieve demand forecast accuracy and bias according to company guidelines, supported by operational analysis to forecast errors demonstrate loss tree, close collaboration with CCBT to improve category S&OP performance.
- Manage S&OP Gap in respective categories on supply and demand front.
- Maintain department reports required on monthly basis
profile_positions.title: Demand Planning Lead & Sudan Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
- Leading Oral Care and Skin Care Factory. 
- Managing the 3rd Party Manufacturing Process.
- Receive from Supply planning the production plan and organize with them the production schedule. 
- Based on the production schedule, organize the manpower accordingly with the standard. 
- Make sure that the production lines keep the expected OLE. 
- Make sure that the production attainment will be achieved also meeting the expected production cost. 
- Make sure that the equipment will be maintained in basic condition by implementing the standard of Autonomous Maintenance. 
- Make sure that the startup operations, change over and cleaning accordingly with GMP to be executed following the appropriate company standard. 
- Cooperate with maintenance team, to organize the schedule for the planned maintenance. 
- Participate in conducting trial and industrial tests of new types of packaging materials, raw materials and finished products. 
- Make proposals on the organization of workplaces to reduce labor costs and improve sanitation and hygiene. 
- Participate in projects to upgrade existing equipment, as well as purchase new ones. 
- Organize the training of production operators and the certification of their skill level. 
- Make sure that put in place the defined actions to eliminate all detected process deviations. 
- Develop and support production team to create and update WCM activity boards. 
- Advise and support, in cooperation with WCM coordinator, production staff on the application of WCM techniques. 
- Participate in conducting internal meetings aimed at developing measures to prevent and eliminate non-conformities and reduce losses.
profile_positions.title: Oral & Skin Care Operations 1st Line Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Evaluate material requirements based on system generated MRP and requisition materials accordingly.
• Expedite and de-expedite raw and package materials to support and maintain a flexible production schedule while communicating with Business Units and support departments to achieve customer satisfaction.
• Monitor raw and package inventory to achieve continuous improvement in inventory optimization. Maintain and utilize inventory models.
• Interface with Purchasing, Supply Chain Planning, Vendors, TCU, IMG and Traffic.
• Maintain Bills of Material, material master data, factory invoices and internal KPI's .
• Apply WCM principals to identify major loss areas, facilitate process improvement.
• Work closely with the production planners to get the material requirements and issue the planned orders.
• Plan raw material and corresponding packaging supply.
• Ensure that the correct prices are updated and request any prices update from the supply management.
• Coordinated with suppliers for issuing purchase orders, and monitored their supply progress.
• Monitored stock levels and maintained optimum business level; interfaced with production and consumption points to maintain min. stock levels.
• Implement consignment inventory goals, turnover targets.
• Issue forecast of the materials to the suppliers on periodic basis.
• Coordinate with the clearance team for shipment clearance.
• Coordinate with the warehousing team to manage the shipment receiving
profile_positions.title: Oral and Skin Care Material Planner

profile_positions.description:
- Execute the supply planning process of inventory planning and the development of master production plan. 
-Conduct formal capacity reviews across the 1 year horizon – identify constraints and propose action plans.
- Key interface between demand planning, supply management, the factories, Strategic planning, and capabilities, and logistics/deployment. 
- Prepare Master Plan using SAP APO, and any other planning tools. 
- Manages and supports projects that are within the brand, i.e. innovations, renovations, transitions, capacity planning, and Value Improvement Programs. 
- Key member of the Category teams and Run Strategy reviews with the factories. 
- Responsible for SKU/Item setups with the Master Data teams, Factories, and other related parties.
- Developing the supply plan to support the business objectives of the brand/category group, focused around the tactical window, while supporting the initiatives from the Strategic & Innovation teams. 
- Setting up new items/sku’s in SAP APO systems to model shipments and production. 
- Control inventory while protecting customer service through coordination with stock replenishment and operations. 
- Main interface between GtM Demand and the Manufacturing sites.
- Establishing the means to plan and ensure smooth running of Supply Chain activities and manage contingencies across external and internal boundaries of the business.
- Deliver required levels of customer service and are responsive to Market Changes and Brand Innovation.
- Work on business waste reduction.
- Work on the Logistics & Customer Service Pillar in the WCM
profile_positions.title: Oral Care Supply Planner

profile_positions.description:
- Working on a business case in the Experience Unilever Day.
- Selected as a member from the winning team in the Experience Unilever Day.
- Qualified to the Country Talent Championship.
- Working on a Unilever business simulation.

- Submitted 7 Proposals with a maximum increase in capacity by 20%, decrease in total paid time by 64% and increase  in labors utilization  from 25% to 70%.

volunteer_experiences.description:
- Managed the Upper Board Selection Process.
- Leading an organization which consists of 180 members.
- Participated in nitiating Nawwar GUC's new mission, vision, hierarchy and job descriptions/specifications of the whole entity.
- Set the strategic goals and objectives of the whole year.
- Managed above 5 internal trainings and workshops for developing members' technical and soft skills.
- Participated in managing "Cheer" offline marketing campaign which aimed to spreading the happiness within the GUC students and that helped in achieving the exposure needed for the club.
- Raised the club's liquidity to a satisfied position.

- Responsible for 5 committees of 40 People. 
- Managed the Selection Process for Nawwar Organizing Committees Heads.
- Managed "You Shall Not Pass" event attended by 200 participants.
- Managed series of events attended by an average of 100+ participants.

- Executed a plan for Fundraising Committee.
- Conducted the committee members' selection (15 members).
- Conducted 5+ trainings for the members (Negotiation skills, Communication Skills, Fundraising basics and Presentation Skills).
- Achieved 3 deals with 3 sponsors to be presented in the GUC

- Get deals with Suppliers. 
- Provided the club with Materials for Events

- Managed General Meeting for the club with 100+ attendees. 
- Managed Recruiting process of the club. 
- Participated in managing funday for the club.
